timeline.description: Honorable mention in the Brazilian Mathematics Olympiad

timeline.title: Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science
timeline.description: Solid background in Computer Science, covering computational thinking, algorithms, programming and software engineering. Front-end application development, focus on UX, code organization and abstraction. Knowledge in data engineering, databases and optimization, as well as programming language paradigms. Experience in machine learning, artificial intelligence and big data. Fundamentals and practice in cloud computing, solution architecture, cybersecurity and distributed computing. Consistent base in operating systems, hardware architecture, as well as computer graphics, formal languages, compilers, emerging technologies, project management, innovation and entrepreneurship

timeline.title: Test Automation Engineer
timeline.description: Working on test automation in Java for Big Data, with ETL/ELT validation in Databricks, functional and performance tests, use of best practices (DDT, BDD, Shift-Left) and integration with Azure, Spark and databases

timeline.title: Get Started with SQL Analytics and BI on Databricks
timeline.description: Introductory and practical course on data analysis in Databricks, focused on Data Intelligence, SQL, Delta Lake and AI dashboards for faster decision making

timeline.title: Office Assistant
timeline.description: Young Apprentice - SENAI - Logistics and industrial process operator, administrative activities and IT support

timeline.title: Electronics, computer maintenance and configuration course
timeline.description: Cleaning, maintenance, assembly, hardware and software configuration, computer networks and information security

timeline.title: Programming best practices: improve the code of a Java API
timeline.description: Architecture and persistence best practices, including separation of responsibilities, use of DTO, flexible validations and performance optimizations

timeline.title: Java and refactoring: improving codes with best practices
timeline.description: Software engineering practices, focusing on refactoring, SOLID principles, domain modeling, automated tests and design patterns

timeline.title: Qualification in Cloud Solutions Architecture
timeline.description: Studies in behavior and human factors in software development, cybersecurity fundamentals and cloud computing (SaaS, PaaS, IaaS), focusing on architecture, management and security of scalable systems, pentesting, Kali Linux and networks

timeline.title: Hackers do Bem Program - Fundamentals
timeline.description: Information security fundamentals, covering threats and malware, access controls, IAM, cryptography, secure networks and hosts, web protection, backups, PKI/Blockchain and incident response

timeline.title: Hackers do Bem Program - Leveling
timeline.description: Cybersecurity fundamentals, computer networks (TCP/IP, IPv6), hardware, Windows and Linux, as well as programming logic and script development

timeline.title: AWS Academy Graduate - Introduction to Cloud Semester 1 - Training Badge
timeline.description: Introductory AWS Cloud course, covering cloud computing fundamentals, architecture, security, costs, support and use of AWS Management Console in practical scenarios

timeline.title: Public Speaking in Schools
timeline.description: Public Speaking in Schools Program, focused on communication and public speaking skills

timeline.title: Qualification in Full Stack Solutions Development
timeline.description: Studies in code organization and abstraction, API development with Spring Boot, user-centered design (UX) and web interface development with React, focusing on usability and responsiveness

timeline.title: Qualification in Software Engineering
timeline.description: Development of technical communication, design and process engineering, database optimization and study of programming paradigms, React Native and mobile development, Architecture, documentation and agile methodologies

timeline.title: Qualification in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Big Data
timeline.description: Knowledge in artificial intelligence and machine learning (neural networks, CNNs, regression, data analysis with Python), project management based on PMBOK and agile methods, and Big Data with Hadoop, Spark, Databricks and NoSQL

servicos.title: Front-end Development
servicos.description: I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, plus a bit of Back-end to give more capacity to my projects. I deepened my knowledge with courses from Rocketseat, W3schools, SENAI and at college.
servicos.popup_cite: What the user sees the heart
servicos.popup_about_description_p1: As I like programming, and also design, working as front-end is very satisfying for me. I like to create and think about how people will interact with my creations. The interface of a program or site can be the difference for user satisfaction.
servicos.popup_about_description_p2: I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, plus a bit of Back-end to give more redundancy to my projects. I deepened my knowledge with courses from Rocketseat, W3schools, SENAI and at college. Ensuring quality and security is essential for a site or program.
servicos.popup_about_description_p3: The potential that a web page can provide is incredible, stores, blogs, news sites, search engines, software. Everything depends on the creativity of its developer. And I can be that developer.

servicos.title: Graphic Design
servicos.description: I work with design for the most diverse areas and functions, I always try to do unique works, in them I like to extract the objective of the project and do something really remarkable with it.
servicos.popup_cite: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it
servicos.popup_about_description_p1: I venture into designs, besides being an area that I have interest in, it is fascinating because it integrates concepts of colors, shapes, composições and mainly the human psyche, design is present in all things of our daily life, every format, every shape is there for some reason, someone thought, studied and planned so that their work passes what was desired. Móveis, pinturas, aparelhos eletrônicos, sites, programas, maquiagem, fotografia, estruturas… tudo é design, tudo é arte.
servicos.popup_about_description_p2: A good design awakens emotions and experiences and that is what I try to bring in every project and in every work of mine, I use several tools to create my designs, the internet brought a sea of tools, inspirations, feedbacks and knowledge, I always try to use this to my favor.
servicos.popup_about_description_p3: I work on sites, pamphlets, letters, presentations, bookmarks, book covers, Logos… As I do personalized works each design is different from the other, I try to understand the objective of the work and make it unique. see my works in my portfolio in the button below:

servicos.title: Programming
servicos.description: I program mainly in Python and Java, these two languages are the most used nowadays. they have a large community and a lot of repertoire and content to study and program.
servicos.popup_cite: Everyone should learn how to program, because it teaches you how to
servicos.popup_about_description_p1: Programming, or understanding how it works is essential to understand the world we live in, all modern technology works thanks to its programming, from the lowest level languages to the highest level ones, nowadays it is possible to create your own programming language.
servicos.popup_about_description_p2: I program mainly in Python and Java, these two languages are one of the most used nowadays. they have a large community and a lot of repertoire and content to study and program, however I also intend to learn more languages to increase my capabilities.
servicos.popup_about_description_p3: Programming is a facilitator that provides numerous automations, projects, both with software and hardware. Working with programming is very useful because they are flexible and allow corrections and optimizations in your project, so it stays always current and functional, a hardware can get old and impossible to update, but a software not. See my works in my portfolio in the button below:

servicos.title: Back-end Developer
servicos.description: I work with back-end using Java, and I have experiences in Google Cloud Platform (GCP), I gained experience in tests and automation in my scholarship at Compass UOL.
servicos.popup_cite: The art of programming is the art of organizing and mastering
servicos.popup_about_description_p1: The back-end of a program or site is one of the most fundamental parts of a system, after all it is thanks to it that everything gains ''life'' manage, process, store, receive, and send data, the back-end is indispensable for any application, a good back-end is essential for security, privacy, speed and usability of any system.
servicos.popup_about_description_p2: With my experience in Java programming, besides Google Cloud Platform (GCP) courses, A great experience in Back-end is my scholarship at Compass UOL, in it I had studies in the Scrum and QA area, where all contents were documented through Git on GitLab during Sprints, studies addressed software fundamentals, how to plan and document tests always keeping in mind how important they are to generate value for the application, knowing how to report bugs and improvements in issues, we also performed test automation using RestAssured.
servicos.popup_about_description_p3: Ensuring great, fast, simple code that can be updated and understood by more programmers on the team makes a difference in large projects, optimization is important for the agility of a server or program, after all everything is connected and advanced nowadays, due to this we must follow such progress. See my works in my portfolio in the button below:
